text: Jan Furtok (9 March 1962 â€“ 26 November 2024) was a Polish professional footballer. He played as a striker. He played for the Poland national football team from 1984 to 1993, making thirty-six appearances. Furtok was born in Katowice, Poland. Furtok was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease in 2015. He died on 26 November 2024 from problems caused by the disease in Katowice at the age of 62. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Polish footballers
